Description: Painted limestone shabti of Rahotep with a black lappet-wig, a carved brown face with black eyes, the creases of the neck are marked with black, the collar is red and black, the crossed brown hands are in relief, the body is white, the front of the legs is inscribed with a central column of black painted hieroglyphs flanked by black lines, the backs of the arms are decorated with representations of two red seed-baskets.
